name: Moon Lander (itch)
description:
Moon Lander

   This is a simple bullet-hell game made entirely in java using a self-made framework without any extra 3rd party libraries. The objective of the game is to dodge the projectiles moving towards you and survive as much time as you can. 

Game By: 

Ivan Mota

Controls: 

  • Arrow keys = move / turn on engine

Requirements:

  • Have Java SE Runtime Environment Installed

Feel free to send me any question, comment or suggestion  to my email:

  • Ivanmtta@gmail.com
